alert.note: Alert for Switzerland (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 1:46PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SNOW SHOWER WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN SWITZERLAND... EASTERN CARROLL...GRANT...OWEN AND GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 215 PM EST... At 146 PM EST, a snow shower was located near Kentucky Speedway, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Rapid reductions in visibility may cause travel difficulties. In addition, bridges and overpasses may become briefly snow covered and slick. Locations impacted include... Williamstown, Dry Ridge, Vevay, Warsaw, Owenton, Florence, Kentucky Speedway, Glencoe, Ghent, Sanders, Corinth, Sparta, Worthville, Monterey, Gratz, Stewartsville, Elk Lake, Wheatley, New Liberty, and New Columbus. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 42 and 66. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 143 and 159. Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
